title: 懂mypet的进来解决下！
txt_content:
ChooseOnceDetermines whether skilltrees can be switches only one or as often as the owner want to.
Possible values: true or falseMyPet:  Skilltree:    ChooseOnce: true

上面的啥意思！！！我翻译了 看不懂！！！！
！！！最后求告知！！怎么惩罚切换技能树的严重点？？我试了下面那个！！！扣不了多少经验！很少很少！！！我想要那种直接扣你很多经验那种！比如你100级 我就扣50级以上等等！！！
SwitchPenaltyDetermines how much experience it will cost to switch a skilltree. Values are given in experience/percent of experience.MyPet:  Skilltree:    SwitchPenaltyFixed: 0.0    SwitchPenaltyPercent: 5
